comments.body:
This might be wrong. SMIs are signed. I think this should actually be 0x3FFFFFFFFFFFFFFF and you only get 62 bits, because one of the bits is the signed bit.
https://www.dartlang.org/articles/numeric-computation/#smis-and-mints
Do you want to file a bug about that?  It doesn't seem like something I should fix in this patch.
Actually, I'll fix it in the gestures patch.,

Here and below: Very minor nit, source files should [end with a linefeed](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/729692/why-should-text-files-end-with-a-newline). That said, that's probably more pedantic than anything -- I'm 99% certain that the entire Dart toolchain consistently handles this just fine without it. But not a bad idea anyway.
